title: Kawhi Leonard of the Los Angeles Clippers drives to the basket against Isaac Okoro in the Clippers' NBA victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers | News | fbherald.com
text:
Kawhi Leonard of the Los Angeles Clippers drives to the basket against Isaac Okoro in the Clippers' NBA victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers
- Katelyn Mulcahy
- Updated
0
Tags
As featured on
Kawhi Leonard scored 33 points and Ivica Zubac added 28 on his 28th birthday on Tuesday as the Los Angeles Clippers rallied to hand the NBA-leading Cleveland Cavaliers a second straight defeat, 132-119.
